verses.verse: כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD לִמְשִׁיחוֹ֮ <WH4899> lim-shi-Cho to his anointed לְכ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> le-Cho-resh to Cyrus אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Whom הֶחֱזַ֣קְתִּי <WH2388> he-che-Zak-ti I have holden בִֽימִינ֗וֹ <WH3225> vi-mi-No, whose right hand לְרַד־ <WH7286> le-rad- to subdue לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> go-Yim, nations וּמָתְנֵ֥י <WH4975> u-ma-te-Nei the loins מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim of kings אֲפַתֵּ֑חַ <WH6605> 'a-fat-Te-ach; him and I will loose לִפְתֹּ֤חַ <WH6605> lif-To-ach to open לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> le-fa-Nav before דְּלָתַ֔יִם <WH1817> de-la-Ta-yim, him the two leaved gates וּשְׁעָרִ֖ים <WH8179> u-she-'a-Rim and the gates לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יִסָּגֵֽרוּ׃ <WH5462> yis-sa-Ge-ru. shall not be shut

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> 'a-Ni I לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-cha before אֵלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> 'e-Lech, will go וַהֲדוּרִ֖ים <WH1921> va-ha-du-Rim the crooked places; אֹושִׁר 'o-shir כאֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <WH3474> 'a-yash-Sher; direct קדַּלְת֤וֹת <WH1817> dal-Tot the gates נְחוּשָׁה֙ <WH5154> ne-chu-Shah of brass אֲשַׁבֵּ֔ר <WH7665> 'a-shab-Ber, I will break in pieces וּבְרִיחֵ֥י <WH1280> u-ve-ri-Chei the bars בַרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> var-Zel of iron אֲגַדֵּֽעַ׃ <WH1438> 'a-gad-De-a'. and cut in sunder

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will give לְךָ֙ le-Cha אוֹצְר֣וֹת <WH214> otz-Rot thee the treasures חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech, of darkness וּמַטְמֻנֵ֖י <WH4301> u-mat-mu-Nei and hidden riches מִסְתָּרִ֑ים <WH4565> mis-ta-Rim; of secret places לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an that תֵּדַ֗ע <WH3045> te-Da', that thou mayest know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that it אֲנִ֧י <WH589> 'a-Ni is I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh that I the LORD הַקּוֹרֵ֥א <WH7121> hak-ko-Re which call בְשִׁמְךָ֖ <WH8034> ve-shim-Cha [thee] by thy name אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei [am] the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an the sake עַבְדִּ֣י <WH5650> 'av-Di my servant's יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, For Jacob וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El sake and Israel בְּחִירִ֑י <WH972> be-chi-Ri; mine elect וָאֶקְרָ֤א <WH7121> va-'ek-Ra I have even called לְךָ֙ le-Cha בִּשְׁמֶ֔ךָ <WH8034> bish-Me-cha, thee by thy name אֲכַנְּךָ֖ <WH3655> 'a-chan-ne-Cha I have surnamed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH3045> ye-da'-Ta-ni. thee though thou hast not known

אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there ע֔וֹד <WH5750> od, other זוּלָתִ֖י <WH2108> zu-la-Ti beside אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein is no אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; and [there is] none else [there is] no God אֲאַזֶּרְךָ֖ <WH247> 'a-'az-zer-Cha me I girded וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not יְדַעְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH3045> ye-da'-Ta-ni. thee though thou hast not known

לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of יֵדְע֗וּ <WH3045> ye-de-'U, That they may know מִמִּזְרַח־ <WH4217> mi-miz-rach- from the rising שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> she-mesh of the sun וּמִמַּ֣עֲרָבָ֔הּ <WH4628> u-mi-Ma-'a-ra-Vah, and from the west כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- there אֶ֖פֶס <WH657> 'E-fes that [there is] none בִּלְעָדָ֑י <WH1107> bil-'a-Dai; beside אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> od. other

יוֹצֵ֥ר <WH3335> yo-Tzer I form אוֹר֙ <WH216> 'Or the light וּבוֹרֵ֣א <WH1254> u-vo-Re and create חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech, darkness עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh I make שָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> sha-Lom peace וּב֣וֹרֵא <WH1254> u-Vo-re and create רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; evil אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I the LORD עֹשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh do כָל־ <WH3605> chol all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> 'El-leh. these ס sa-Mek

הַרְעִ֤יפוּ <WH7491> har-'I-fu Drop down שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim ye heavens מִמַּ֔עַל <WH4605> mi-Ma-'al, from above וּשְׁחָקִ֖ים <WH7834> u-she-cha-Kim and let the skies יִזְּלוּ־ <WH5140> yiz-ze-lu- pour down צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek; righteousness תִּפְתַּח־ <WH6605> tif-tach- open אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz let the earth וְיִפְרוּ־ <WH6509> ve-yif-ru- and let them bring forth יֶ֗שַׁע <WH3468> Ye-sha', salvation וּצְדָקָ֤ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah and let righteousness תַצְמִ֙יחַ֙ <WH6779> tatz-Mi-ach spring up יַ֔חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad, together אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I the LORD בְּרָאתִֽיו׃ <WH1254> be-ra-Tiv. have created ס sa-Mek

ה֗וֹי <WH1945> Ho, Woe רָ֚ב <WH7378> rav unto him that striveth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יֹ֣צְר֔וֹ <WH3335> yo-tze-Ro, with his Maker חֶ֖רֶשׂ <WH2789> Che-res [Let] the potsherd אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חַרְשֵׂ֣י <WH2789> char-Sei [strive] with the potsherds אֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> 'a-da-Mah; of the earth הֲיֹאמַ֨ר <WH559> ha-yo-Mar say חֹ֤מֶר <WH2563> Cho-mer Shall the clay לְיֹֽצְרוֹ֙ <WH3335> le-yo-tze-Ro to him that fashioneth מַֽה־ <WH4100> mah- What תַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh, it What makest וּפָעָלְךָ֖ <WH6467> u-fa-'a-le-Cha thou;or thy work אֵין־ <WH369> 'ein- has יָדַ֥יִם <WH3027> ya-Da-yim able לֽוֹ׃ lo. ס sa-Mek

ה֛וֹי <WH1945> Ho Woe אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> 'o-Mer unto him that saith לְאָ֖ב <WH1> le-'Av unto [his] father מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What תּוֹלִ֑יד <WH3205> to-Lid; What begettest וּלְאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> u-le-'ish-Shah thou;or to the woman מַה־ <WH4100> mah- to what תְּחִילִֽין׃ <WH2342> te-chi-Lin. What hast thou brought forth ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֧ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD קְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> ke-Doosh the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְיֹצְר֑וֹ <WH3335> ve-yo-tze-Ro; and his Maker הָאֹתִיּ֣וֹת <WH857> ha-'o-ti-Yot me of things to come שְׁאָל֔וּנִי <WH7592> she-'a-Lu-ni, Ask עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- about בָּנַ֛י <WH1121> ba-Nai concerning my sons וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- concerning פֹּ֥עַל <WH6467> Po-'al and concerning the work יָדַ֖י <WH3027> ya-Dai of my hands תְּצַוֻּֽנִי׃ <WH6680> te-tzav-Vu-ni. command

אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi is I עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti I have made אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz, the earth וְאָדָ֖ם <WH120> ve-'a-Dam man עָלֶ֣יהָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha and בָרָ֑אתִי <WH1254> va-Ra-ti; and created אֲנִ֗י <WH589> 'a-Ni, my יָדַי֙ <WH3027> ya-Dai upon it I [even] my hands נָט֣וּ <WH5186> na-Tu have stretched out שָׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim, the heavens וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all צְבָאָ֖ם <WH6635> tze-va-'Am and all their host צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> tziv-Vei-ti. have I commanded

אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I הַעִירֹתִ֣הֽוּ <WH5782> ha-'i-ro-Ti-hu I have raised him up בְצֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> ve-Tze-dek, in righteousness וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all דְּרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> de-ra-Chav all his ways אֲיַשֵּׁ֑ר <WH3474> 'a-yash-Sher; and I will direct הֽוּא־ <WH1931> hu- He יִבְנֶ֤ה <WH1129> yiv-Neh he shall build עִירִי֙ <WH5892> 'i-Ri my city וְגָלוּתִ֣י <WH1546> ve-ga-lu-Ti my captives יְשַׁלֵּ֔חַ <WH7971> ye-shal-Le-ach, and he shall let go לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo Without בִמְחִיר֙ <WH4242> vim-Chir not for price וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo Without בְשֹׁ֔חַד <WH7810> ve-Sho-chad, nor reward אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> tze-va-'ot. of hosts פ Peh

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God יְגִ֨יעַ <WH3018> ye-Gi-a' The labour מִצְרַ֥יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt וּֽסְחַר־ <WH5505> u-se-char- and merchandise כּוּשׁ֮ <WH3568> kush of Ethiopia וּסְבָאִים֮ <WH5436> u-se-va-'Im and of the Sabeans אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei men מִדָּה֒ <WH4060> mid-Dah of stature עָלַ֤יִךְ <WH5921> 'a-La-yich and יַעֲבֹ֙רוּ֙ <WH5674> ya-'a-Vo-ru shall come over וְלָ֣ךְ ve-Lach יִֽהְי֔וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu, become אַחֲרַ֣יִךְ <WH310> 'a-cha-Ra-yich after יֵלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> ye-Le-chu, will walk בַּזִּקִּ֖ים <WH2131> baz-zik-Kim thee in chains יַעֲבֹ֑רוּ <WH5674> ya-'a-Vo-ru; they shall come over וְאֵלַ֤יִךְ <WH413> ve-'e-La-yich and יִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּוּ֙ <WH7812> yish-ta-chav-Vu and they shall fall down אֵלַ֣יִךְ <WH413> 'e-La-yich to you יִתְפַּלָּ֔לוּ <WH6419> yit-pal-La-lu, unto thee they shall make supplication אַ֣ךְ <WH389> 'ach Surely בָּ֥ךְ <WH99999> bach אֵ֛ל <WH410> 'el unto thee [saying] Surely God וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there ע֖וֹד <WH5750> od else אֶ֥פֶס <WH657> 'E-fes [is] in thee and [there is] none else [there is] no אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. God

אָכֵ֕ן <WH403> 'a-Chen Verily אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el thou [art] a God מִסְתַּתֵּ֑ר <WH5641> mis-tat-Ter; that hidest אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei thyself O God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> mo-Shi-a'. the Saviour

בּ֥וֹשׁוּ <WH954> Boo-shu They shall be ashamed וְגַֽם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and even נִכְלְמ֖וּ <WH3637> nich-le-Mu and also confounded כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul-Lam; all יַחְדָּו֙ <WH3162> yach-Dav together הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> ha-le-Chu all of them they shall go בַכְּלִמָּ֔ה <WH3639> vak-ke-lim-Mah, to confusion חָרָשֵׁ֖י <WH2796> cha-ra-Shei [that are] makers צִירִֽים׃ <WH6736> tzi-Rim. of idols

יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El [But] Israel נוֹשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> no-Sha' shall be saved בַּיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, in the LORD תְּשׁוּעַ֖ת <WH8668> te-shu-'At salvation עוֹלָמִ֑ים <WH5769> o-la-Mim; with an everlasting לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not תֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <WH954> te-Vo-shu ye shall not be ashamed וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- or תִכָּלְמ֖וּ <WH3637> tik-kal-Mu nor confounded עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against ע֥וֹלְמֵי <WH5769> ol-mei world עַֽד׃ <WH5703> 'Ad. without end פ Peh

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> choh thus אָֽמַר־ <WH559> 'a-mar- For thus saith יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בּוֹרֵ֨א <WH1254> bo-Re that created הַשָּׁמַ֜יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim the heavens ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, God יֹצֵ֨ר <WH3335> yo-Tzer himself that formed הָאָ֤רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the earth וְעֹשָׂהּ֙ <WH6213> ve-'o-Sah and made ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu He כֽוֹנְנָ֔הּ <WH3559> chon-Nah, it he hath established לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not תֹ֥הוּ <WH8414> To-hu it not in vain בְרָאָ֖הּ <WH1254> ve-ra-'Ah it he created לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> la-She-vet it to be inhabited יְצָרָ֑הּ <WH3335> ye-tza-Rah; he formed אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and there עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> od. else

לֹ֧א <WH3808> lo not בַסֵּ֣תֶר <WH5643> vas-Se-ter in secret דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, I have not spoken בִּמְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> bim-kOm place אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz of the earth חֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> Cho-shech, in a dark לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not אָמַ֛רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti I said לְזֶ֥רַע <WH2233> le-Ze-ra' not unto the seed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob תֹּ֣הוּ <WH8414> To-hu ye me in vain בַקְּשׁ֑וּנִי <WH1245> vak-ke-Shu-ni; Seek אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh I the LORD דֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> do-Ver speak צֶ֔דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek, righteousness מַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> mag-Gid I declare מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> mei-sha-Rim. things that are right

הִקָּבְצ֥וּ <WH6908> hik-ka-ve-Tzu Assemble וָבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> va-Vo-'u yourselves and come הִֽתְנַגְּשׁ֥וּ <WH5066> hit-nag-ge-Shu draw near יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> yach-Dav together פְּלִיטֵ֣י <WH6412> pe-li-Tei ye [that are] escaped הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim; of the nations לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo no יָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> ya-de-'U, they have no knowledge הַנֹּֽשְׂאִים֙ <WH5375> han-no-se-'Im that set up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz the wood פִּסְלָ֔ם <WH6459> pis-Lam, of their graven image וּמִתְפַּלְלִ֔ים <WH6419> u-mit-pal-Lim, and pray אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֵ֖ל <WH410> 'el unto a god לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo cannot יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> yo-Shi-a'.
